root: ^So, you’re here for a loan, huh? Here are your options.
^$100000 with a 5% interest rate compounded ever 5 seconds
^$200000 with a 2.5% interest rate compounded every half-second
^$50000 with a 10% flat interest rate every 5 seconds

g-1: ^You can view your debt anytime through the UI and pay it off in parts.
^Be careful of the interest as waiting to pay it off will make it harder.
^That was quite a lot of money you took out. What’s it for?
^I’m actually looking to start a car part manufacturing business in this town.
^I actually worked as a sales associate for Edison not too long ago, but decided to leave to explore new opportunities.
^If you’re new here, you’ll probably be needing some assistance with the constantly changing market.
^Random events can occur which will affect the market on a case by case basis. You will be alerted when it occurs.
^You seem  to be quite knowledgeable. Would you like to be my manager?
^Yes, sure! To get started, we’re going to need a factory, some raw materials, and many new workers.
^Also, if you’re serious about growing this business, you’re going to need some advertisements to spread the word.
^Check out their building in the East of town
